It would be nice to be able to use avatar gifs on KSP Forums. Still though - I made one for Google+ (which creates a black outline on the gif, unfortunately)!

Today will be the first day at school, and I really couldn't get myself to sleep, so I made this instead!

Not a lot of work went into it, however it ended up pretty great! Just wanted to share.

Here is the original image (no outline):

https://i.imgur.com/CTirobo.gif

The animation may appear to be slower if zoomed out.

I wish I was talented enough to make something KSP-related.

That looks awesome, can I have it...

Lewl
Couldn't agree more. I was going to use this fabulous gif of Carl Sagan.

Please no. People cannot contain themselves with the signatures, just imagine how much of a epileptic seizure inducing carnival it is going to be when you can animate avatars.

That being said, I like to one in the top post.
